rules_text: Whenever Ragged Rapscallion becomes tapped during your turn, target creature or Vehicle an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“I lost me eye to the great captain Crain, and me leg to an eighty-foot kraken. Aye, but neither compares to me heart, which I lost to
the finest lass in the Three Seas ...”[/i]
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
